content.rendered:
So what games can you play beyond the world of Minecraft Classic? Thankfully, since Minecraft was so influential, there are plenty of Minecraft-inspired titles that will take you beyond the realm of creepers and procedurally generated worlds. Have you ever wondered what 2D Minecraft would look like?

Original Minecraft

However, if you want to play the original pre-release game, Mojang has released Minecraft classics to celebrate the game’s 10th anniversary. This version is based on the browser-based alpha version of the game, a bit of nostalgia for the original Minecrafters out there.

There are many similar sandbox games in this genre. Some of these games are self-proclaimed Minecraft clones like Mine Clone 3 which shares many similarities with the original game.

Games inspired by Minecraft

There are many innovative titles that use Minecraft elements to create an entirely new game. Do you want to improve your parkour moves? MineParkour.Club lets you do just that. Practice jumps and collect points on the Minecraft Parkour track!

Minecraft zombie games

If you like your blocky world full of multiplayer action, games like Pixel Gun Apocalypse 3 will satisfy your need to play fast FPS in Minecraft-like environment. In other games like ShooterZ and WorldZ, you fight to survive in a blockalyptic zombie landscape. There is a plethora of Minecraft zombie games that you can play in your web browser.

Browse our games collection for more free Minecraft games and see what you can find! All of these titles are free to play in your web browser, no download required.

Minecraft games are based on the game Minecraft. They feature several elements from the original game, most notably the pixelated 3D blocks. Minecraft games take this unique theme and use it to create creative games with entirely new goals. You can even play the original here!

We have collected 84 of the best free online minecraft games. These also include games for the browser or for computers and mobile devices, as well as racing games for your Android and IoS mobile phone or tablet. Here we show you games 1-70, including Mine-Craft.io, Minecraft Classic, Paper Minecraft and many more free titles.
